item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, November 26, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Launch HN: Human Layer (YC F24) – Human-in-the-Loop API for AI Systems (187 points | 118 comments)
2. Teen mathematicians tie knots through a mind-blowing fractal (80 points | 6 comments)
3. A solution to The Onion problem of J. Kenji Lopez-Alt (2021) (241 points | 87 comments)
4. Hats Off to NASA's Webb: Sombrero Galaxy Dazzles in New Image (47 points | 8 comments)
5. We can mine asteroids for space food (99 points | 98 comments)
6. LLVM-powered devirtualization (149 points | 3 comments)
7. Show HN: SQLite Plugin for Jekyll (149 points | 48 comments)
8. The AI reporter that took my old job just got fired (195 points | 216 comments)
9. Show HN: Silent Poems – Visual expression of unspoken thoughts (57 points | 20 comments)
10. Henry James and H.G. Wells (1958) (43 points | 27 comments)
11. Setelinleikkaus: When Finns snipped their cash in half to curb inflation (177 points | 162 comments)
12. CEO fired 90% of staff for missing a morning meeting. He stands by the choice (9 points | 6 comments)
13. New release of Cataclysm-DDA, 0.H-RELEASE (3 points | discuss)
14. Remembering Cyberia, the first ever cyber cafe (82 points | 54 comments)
15. GenChess (72 points | 68 comments)
16. OpenAI's Sora Tool Leaked by Group of Aggrieved Early Testers (5 points | 2 comments)
17. California's most neglected group of students: the gifted ones (257 points | 340 comments)
18. A Short Introduction to Automotive Lidar Technology (229 points | 168 comments)
19. Y Combinator often backs startups that duplicate other YC companies, data shows (299 points | 150 comments)
20. A Guide to Server-Side Rendering (4 points | 2 comments)
21. A slave narrative resurfaces after nearly 170 years (104 points | 55 comments)
22. Scientists are learning why ultra-processed foods are bad (122 points | 242 comments)
23. A Revolution in How Robots Learn (27 points | 5 comments)
24. Poisoning the Day (156 points | 64 comments)
25. Tunable ultrasound propagation in microscale metamaterials (21 points | 3 comments)
26. Artificial Intelligence and the Future of Work (10 points | discuss)
27. 'The Best of All Possible Worlds' Review: Leibniz Lives Again (72 points | 53 comments)
28. DEA passenger searches halted after watchdog finds signs of rights violations (144 points | 149 comments)
29. Show HN: Gemini LLM corrects ASR YouTube transcripts (162 points | 101 comments)
30. One Billion Nested Loop Iterations (49 points | 36 comments)
